prompt.goal: Set Up TypeScript Configuration (tsconfig.json). This task focuses on setting up the TypeScript compiler configuration.

context.description: This task focuses on setting up the TypeScript compiler configuration. A `tsconfig.json` file will be created and configured to define how the TypeScript code should be compiled into JavaScript, ensuring code quality and maintainability.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: A `tsconfig.json` file is created in the project root.
The configuration includes essential compiler options like `target`, `module`, `rootDir`, `outDir`, `esModuleInterop`, and `strict`.
The configuration correctly points `rootDir` to `./src` and `outDir` to `./dist`.
